Vrbnik is a picturesque town on high cliff above the sea. It is a place of good wine "Vrbni훾ka 탑lahtina".
From the Krk bridge follow the signs for Baska. After about 30 Km you will see signposts for Vrbnik.
On foot! Vrbnik is hilltop town with small narrow streets not suitable for cars.
"Vrbni훾ka 탑lahtina" wine. It is grown on the fields around Vrbnik and it is one of the best white wines in Croatia.
Go to a man called Osipic. Everybody knows him in town. He's a fisherman and rents out apartments to tourists. Definitely the best place to stay and should not miss his famous grilled fish.
